member.param: The key to be added or whose value should be updated.
The value to be added for an absent key.
The function used to generate a new value for an existing key based on the key's existing value.
member.returns: The new value for the key. This will be either be addValue (if the key was absent) or the result of updateValueFactory (if the key was present).

The function used to generate a value for an absent key.
The function used to generate a new value for an existing key based on the key's existing value.
member.returns: The new value for the key. This will be either be the result of addValueFactory (if the key was absent) or the result of updateValueFactory (if the key was present).
